backend/main.mo: Actor handling user registration, login, session creation, and profile initialization with access control and multiple credential indexes.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a credentialsByPrincipal index by deriving it from existing username-based credentials.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend registration error‑messaging update to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purposes and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling auth state, profile setup, theme/providers, and rendering the responsive shell.
frontend/src/auth/authMessages.ts: Centralized auth messaging, error categorization, and backend-to-frontend registration error mapping utilities.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication context managing session initialization, login, registration, logout, and backend session validation.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, and clearing auth session data in localStorage with expiration handling and type normalization.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Re-exports the auth context hook for accessing auth state.
Layout component for authentication pages with logo, title, optional description, and centered content container.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a channel category with admin drag-and-drop reordering for text and voice channels and a dialog to create new channels.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Dialog for creating a new server category with validation, mutation handling, and backend action guards.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels in a category with type selection, mutation logic, and backend guards.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message composer for text channels supporting send actions, enter-to-send, disabled states, and backend guards.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Chat view showing messages for the selected channel with auto-scroll, loading states, and a composer at the bottom.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders an individual chat message with avatar, author info, timestamp, and content, enabling profile selection on click.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Displays community servers with search filtering and join actions in a discovery interface.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Shows a server preview card with name, description, member count, and a button to join.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the direct messages home view or friends list depending on navigation state, with an empty-state message.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Renders a friend's avatar, name, status, and action buttons including messaging, calling, and options menu.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Manages friend lists, pending requests, and adding friends using tabs and related actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Layouts the desktop app shell including server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses which main view to render based on navigation state such as DMs, discovery, server channels, or settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Provides the mobile app layout with slide-in panels for servers, channels, members, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop shell layouts based on screen width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Displays a scrollable list of server members with avatars and names, allowing selection of a member.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Sidebar showing server categories and channels with drag-and-drop reordering and category creation support.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Mobile top bar providing navigation buttons and context‑aware server or home titles.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Left-side server list rail with ordered servers, home button, and server creation entry.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new users to set their display name and create their profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog for assigning or removing server roles for a member with pending‑change handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Overlay showing a member's profile, roles, and actions like role management if permitted.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name, description, and backend action safety checks.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Renders a server icon image if available or a fallback with the server's initial.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating text or voice channels, handling category selection and mutations.
Dialog to move a channel to another category with validation and loading states.
Panel for selecting members and viewing or editing their assigned roles in a server.
Displays sorted server audit log entries with formatted event details and loading states.
Shows categories and channels with ordering controls and supports channel creation and reordering.
Provides a form to view and update server settings like description, banner, icon, and community mode. Fetches server data and saves updates via mutation.
Lets admins select a server member, view their roles, and open a dialog to manage assignments. Loads members and roles, showing badges for current roles.
Displays existing roles and allows creating new roles with name and color. Uses queries and mutations to manage role data for the selected server.
Manages server settings navigation and displays selected settings pages with a sidebar.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Allows users to change theme and text scaling. Uses settings state and theme hooks to apply appearance preferences.
Lets users edit profile fields and username while showing account email. Loads and updates profile and username using query mutations.
Renders the user settings layout with navigation between pages and a logout option. Controls which settings page is active and handles closing the panel.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Shows connection status to the backend, including loading and error recovery instructions. Provides a retry option when connection fails.
Displays a static stage layout with speakers and audience sections and a button to raise hand.
Shows voice channel participants, connection status, and join/leave controls using backend presence data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Returns whether backend actions should be disabled based on backend connection state.
Determines backend availability by combining safe actor state with a lightweight health check and exposes retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Detects whether the viewport width is below a given breakpoint and updates on resize.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Logs out the user and clears all React Query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides typed React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data with friendly error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with retry and error tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for dark and light themes, plus base styles and a transition utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements a login and signup UI with form state, validation, and error handling using the auth context.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides a navigation context managing current view, selected server/channel, UI panels, and category expansion.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Stores and retrieves per-server and per-channel notification mute settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Implements a settings context with theme, accent color, text scale, notifications, and keybinds persisted to localStorage.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces for servers, channels, roles, members, messages, and audit logs matching backend data.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Applies and builds ordering for categories and channels by merging persisted order with current server data.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Provides utilities to remove a specific DOM element by XPath, including a MutationObserver for ongoing removal.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Provides helpers to sanitize hex color strings and compute luminance-based contrast for text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it doesn’t finish within the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, and animations with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and feature requests for registration logic and credential indexing.
